languages.text: "Ах да, еще эти ублюдки регулярно застраивают вход в технические туннели своими хибарами. Из-за этого бригады инфернусов несколько раз не успевали добраться до аварийных зон, и у смежных отсеков были проблемы с подачей воздуха и питания. Мы таких вредителей жжем вместе с лачугами, а они все одно — прут".

"Oh, another thing the bastards do on a regular basis is build their shacks in front of service tunnel entrances. That has delayed the arrival of infernus brigades during several emergencies, and caused air and power supply problems in adjacent bays. We burn those saboteurs along with their shacks, but they just keep pressing on regardless."
languages.original_text: "Ах да, еще эти ублюдки регулярно застраивают вход в технические туннели своими хибарами. Из-за этого бригады инфернусов несколько раз не успевали добраться до аварийных зон, и у смежных отсеков были проблемы с подачей воздуха и питания. Мы таких вредителей жжем вместе с лачугами, а они все одно — прут".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, and another thing the bastards do on a regular basis is build their shacks in front of technical tunnel entrances. That has prevented infernus brigades from arriving at the scene in time during several emergencies, and caused air and power supply problems in adjacent bays. We burn those saboteurs along with their shacks but they keep pushing on regardless."

"Oh, and another thing the bastards do on a regular basis is build their shacks in front of technical tunnel entrances. That has prevented infernus brigades from arriving at the scene in time during several emergencies, and caused air and power supply problems in adjacent bays. We burn those saboteurs along with their shacks but they keep pushing on regardless."

"Oh, another thing the bastards do on a regular basis is build their shacks in front of service tunnel entrances. That has delayed the arrival of infernus brigades during several emergencies, and caused air and power supply problems in adjacent bays. We burn those saboteurs along with their shacks, but they just keep pressing on regardless."

That has delayed the arrival of infernus brigades during several emergencies, and caused air and power supply problems in adjacent bays. We burn those saboteurs along with their shacks, but they just keep pressing on regardless."

"Oh, another thing the bastards do on a regular basis is build their shacks in front of service tunnel entrances. That has delayed the arrival of infernus brigades during several emergencies, and caused air and power supply problems in adjacent bays. We burn those saboteurs along with their shacks, but they just keep pressing on regardless."

"Oh, another thing the bastards do on a regular basis is build their shacks in front of service tunnel entrances. That has delayed the arrival of infernus brigades during several emergencies, and caused air and power supply problems in adjacent bays. We burn those saboteurs along with their shacks, but they just keep pressing on regardless."

languages.text: «Oh, otra cosa que hacen esos malnacidos es construir sus chozas delante de las entradas a los túneles de servicio. Eso ha retrasado la llegada de las brigadas de infernus durante varias emergencias, además de causar problemas en el suministro de aire y eléctrico en las bahías adyacentes. Incineramos a los saboteadores junto con sus chabolas, pero no dejan de levantarlas».
languages.original_text: "Oh, another thing the bastards do on a regular basis is build their shacks in front of service tunnel entrances. That has delayed the arrival of infernus brigades during several emergencies, and caused air and power supply problems in adjacent bays. We burn those saboteurs along with their shacks, but they just keep pressing on regardless."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, otra cosa que hacen esos malnacidos es construir sus chozas delante de las entradas a los túneles de servicio. Eso ha retrasado la llegada de las brigadas de infernus durante varias emergencias, además de causar problemas en el suministro de aire y eléctrico en las bahías adyacentes. Incineramos a los saboteadores junto con sus chabolas, pero no dejan de levantarlas».

languages.text: 「ああ、あと一つ。連中が定期的にやっているのは、サービストンネルの入り口前に小屋を建てるということです。そのせいで何度か緊急時にインフェルヌス旅団の到着が遅れたり、隣接するベイの空気供給や電気供給に問題が生じています。我々はそういう妨害工作員どもを小屋事燃やしておりますが、連中はかまわず働き続けるのです」
languages.original_text: "Oh, another thing the bastards do on a regular basis is build their shacks in front of service tunnel entrances. That has delayed the arrival of infernus brigades during several emergencies, and caused air and power supply problems in adjacent bays. We burn those saboteurs along with their shacks, but they just keep pressing on regardless."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、あと一つ。連中が定期的にやっているのは、サービストンネルの入り口前に小屋を建てるということです。そのせいで何度か緊急時にインフェルヌス旅団の到着が遅れたり、隣接するベイの空気供給や電気供給に問題が生じています。我々はそういう妨害工作員どもを小屋事燃やしておりますが、連中はかまわず働き続けるのです」

languages.text: “哦，这群混蛋经常干的另一件事情，就是在隧道入口前面盖棚屋。之前有几次发生紧急情况的时候，那些棚屋挡住了控火公会的人，阻碍了及时救援。不仅如此，他们还给邻近甲板造成了空气供应与电力供应方面的问题。就算我们把这群破坏分子连带棚屋一起烧掉，其他人还是会不顾一切地违规乱建。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, another thing the bastards do on a regular basis is build their shacks in front of service tunnel entrances. That has delayed the arrival of infernus brigades during several emergencies, and caused air and power supply problems in adjacent bays. We burn those saboteurs along with their shacks, but they just keep pressing on regardless."

traits.locale_text: “哦，这群混蛋经常干的另一件事情，就是在隧道入口前面盖棚屋。之前有几次发生紧急情况的时候，那些棚屋挡住了控火公会的人，阻碍了及时救援。不仅如此，他们还给邻近甲板造成了空气供应与电力供应方面的问题。就算我们把这群破坏分子连带棚屋一起烧掉，其他人还是会不顾一切地违规乱建。”

languages.text: "Oh, und was diese Mistkerle auch noch regelmäßig machen, ist, dass sie ihre Hütten vor Wartungstunneleingängen bauen. Das hat schon bei mehreren Notfällen die Ankunft von Infernus-Brigaden verzögert und in anliegenden Buchten Probleme mit der Luft- und Energieversorgung verursacht. Wir verbrennen diese Saboteure zusammen mit ihren Schuppen, aber sie machen trotzdem einfach weiter damit."
languages.original_text: "Oh, another thing the bastards do on a regular basis is build their shacks in front of service tunnel entrances. That has delayed the arrival of infernus brigades during several emergencies, and caused air and power supply problems in adjacent bays. We burn those saboteurs along with their shacks, but they just keep pressing on regardless."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, und was diese Mistkerle auch noch regelmäßig machen, ist, dass sie ihre Hütten vor Wartungstunneleingängen bauen. Das hat schon bei mehreren Notfällen die Ankunft von Infernus-Brigaden verzögert und in anliegenden Buchten Probleme mit der Luft- und Energieversorgung verursacht. Wir verbrennen diese Saboteure zusammen mit ihren Schuppen, aber sie machen trotzdem einfach weiter damit."

languages.text: « Oh, et ils prennent également un malin plaisir à construire leurs cabanes devant les entrées des tunnels de service, ce qui a empêché plus d'une fois les brigades infernus d'intervenir à temps sur une urgence, en plus de provoquer des problèmes d'alimentation en air et en électricité des baies adjacentes. Nous avons beau brûler ces taudis avec leurs occupants, ils n'ont toujours pas l'air d'avoir compris le message. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, another thing the bastards do on a regular basis is build their shacks in front of service tunnel entrances. That has delayed the arrival of infernus brigades during several emergencies, and caused air and power supply problems in adjacent bays. We burn those saboteurs along with their shacks, but they just keep pressing on regardless."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, et ils prennent également un malin plaisir à construire leurs cabanes devant les entrées des tunnels de service, ce qui a empêché plus d'une fois les brigades infernus d'intervenir à temps sur une urgence, en plus de provoquer des problèmes d'alimentation en air et en électricité des baies adjacentes. Nous avons beau brûler ces taudis avec leurs occupants, ils n'ont toujours pas l'air d'avoir compris le message. »

languages.text: "Hah, o şerefsizlerin düzenli olarak yaptıkları bir şey de hizmet tüneli girişlerinin önüne barakalarını kurmak. Onlar yüzünden birden çok acil durumda itfacı tugaylarının gelişi gecikti. Bitişik bölmelerde de hava ve güç kaynağı sorunları yaşandı. O sabotajcıları barakalarıyla birlikte yakıyoruz ama her şeye rağmen yaptıklarına devam ediyorlar."
languages.original_text: "Oh, another thing the bastards do on a regular basis is build their shacks in front of service tunnel entrances. That has delayed the arrival of infernus brigades during several emergencies, and caused air and power supply problems in adjacent bays. We burn those saboteurs along with their shacks, but they just keep pressing on regardless."
